ctx: intros p L1 H L2 H0.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable a.

ctx: intros p L1 H L2 H0.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) L1 : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a : Term A n p, q, s : list (Term A n) H : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a H1 : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q L1 H2 : CombLinear L1 p H3 : eqP A eqA n s (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a q) p) L2 : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H0 : forall q : list (Term A n), inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q L1 -> CombLinear L2 q IHCombLinear : CombLinear L2 p Unable to unify "~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a" with "CombLinear L2 s".

ctx: intros p L1 H L2 H0.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) L1 : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a : Term A n p, q, s : list (Term A n) H : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a H1 : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q L1 H2 : CombLinear L1 p H3 : eqP A eqA n s (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a q) p) L2 : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H0 : forall q : list (Term A n), inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q L1 -> CombLinear L2 q IHCombLinear : CombLinear L2 p Unable to unify "CombLinear L2 p" with "inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM s L1".

original: simpl. intros p L1 H L2 H0. induction H. - apply CombLinear_0. - apply CombLinear_1 with (p:=p)(q:=q). + apply H. + apply H0. + apply IHCombLinear.
